question: The Data Governance Quality Index (DGQI) survey is conducted by which organization?
explanation:
The Data Governance Quality Index (DGQI) survey is conducted by the nationâ€™s think tank NITI Aayog, by its Development Monitoring and Evaluation Office.
The survey aims to evaluate the performance of different Ministries /Departments in implementing Central Sector Schemes (CS) and Centrally Sponsored Schemes (CSS). Department of Fertilizers has been ranked 2nd among 65 departments under the Data Governance Quality Index survey.
